headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in Edison International of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - EIX
summary: NEW YORK, March 17, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Edison International  .  Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...

headline: Edison International Provides Update on Ongoing Investigation into Eaton Fire Origin
summary: ROSEMEAD - Edison International's subsidiary, Southern California Edison, will begin the next phase of physical and video inspections and testing of electrical equipment in Eaton Canyon on March 17....

headline: The Prime Suspect Behind California’s Eaton Fire: A ‘Zombie’ Power Line
summary: An investigation by utility Southern California Edison is increasingly focused on whether a decommissioned line was re-energized, sparking the deadly blaze.
